entry.title: Monday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 18. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Monday 24 April 2023
